title: Croma
description: This project is a full-stack MERN application that replicates the Croma.com e-commerce website. It features user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and a responsive design.

title: TATA 1mg
description: 1m-tata.netlify.app is a clone of the Tata 1mg website, developed as a full-stack application to mimic the functionalities of the popular e-commerce platform. The project was developed over a span of 5 days as an individual effort, utilizing a modern tech stack and focusing on key features such as authentication, dynamic content creation, and responsive design.

title: Job Portal
description: This project is a full-stack MERN Job Portal that allows job seekers and employers to interact. Features include user authentication, job posting, application tracking, newsletter automation, and admin controls. Deployed on Render and Netlify.
